mapper.select: select * from NOTICETABLE ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICETABLE(NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT) values (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{title},#{contents},#{writer},sysdate,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICETABLE SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents} where WRITER=#{writer}
